protein.specific_function: Putative target protein of ADP-ribosylation factor

reference.reference_text: Kanoh H, Williger BT, Exton JH: Arfaptin 1, a putative cytosolic target protein of ADP-ribosylation factor, is recruited to Golgi membranes. J Biol Chem. 1997 Feb 28;272(9):5421-9.
